title: Why has Pottu Amman’s name been included in “Wanted” persons list of Interpol?
content: TC – By Upul Joseph Fernando Even today, the names of Pottu Amman and two others linked with him have been posted under red notice in the ‘wanted list’ of Interpol website. If Pottu Amman is dead, there is no reason for his name being published in the ‘wanted list’ in the Interpol website. His…
